typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ActionFamily as string,
		ActionTask as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadCreateActionFamiliesActionTasks
ReadCreateActionFamiliesActionTasks select(mapColumn(
		{$sourceId} = ActionFamily,
		{$targetId} = ActionTask),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$relationshipName} = 'contains_ActionTask',
	{$relationshipDelete} = 'false',
	{$relationshipId} = {$sourceId} + 'to' + {$targetId}) ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_ActionFamiliesActionTasks.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		ActionFamily as string,
		ActionTask as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
ReadCreateActionFamiliesActionTasks select(mapColumn(
		ActionFamily,
		ActionTask),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor union(byName: true)~> StatusUpdateActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
StatusUpdateActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ActionFamiliesActionTasks_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
